articles.description: US President Donald Trump says playing at the 2026 World Cup could be an incentive for Russia to end the war in Ukraine.
articles.title: Ukraine war: Donald Trump says 2026 World Cup could be 'incentive' for Russia to end conflict

articles.description: BBC Sport pundits analyse the conundrums Andy Farrell and his staff will be chewing over with the British and Irish Lions squad poised to be announced.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Squad selection issues before announcement

articles.description: Arsene Wenger proposes a change to the offside rule that would mean attackers are onside if any part of their body is in line with the last outfield defender.
articles.title: Arsene Wenger: Former Arsenal boss proposes change to offside rule after VAR effect

articles.description: All the latest Champions League reaction as Inter beat Barcelona book their place in the final, plus build-up to Arsenal's semi-final second leg against PSG.
articles.title: Champions League reaction as Inter beat Barcelona in thriller to reach final

articles.description: Zhao Xintong's World Championship triumph can help snooker's bid to enter the Olympic Games, says the sport's chair Jason Ferguson.
articles.title: 'Zhao Xintong's world title can help snooker's Olympic bid'

articles.description: Mikel Arteta believes timing is the reason Arsenal have not managed to win as many trophies as they would have liked over recent seasons.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal manager blames timing for lack of trophies in recent seasons

articles.description: Barcelona defender Inigo Martinez denies spitting at Inter Milan's Francesco Acerbi during the Champions League semi-final defeat.
articles.title: Inter Milan v Barcelona: Inigo Martinez denies spitting at Francesco Acerbi

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a tactical look at Arsenal v PSG in the Champions League semi-final second leg in Paris.
articles.title: Arsenal tactics v PSG: Odegaard, Vitinha and four ways Arteta can mastermind Paris win

articles.description: Alpine replace driver Jack Doohan with Franco Colapinto after only six races of the season.
articles.title: Alpine: Franco Colapinto replaces Jack Doohan

articles.description: Stephen Curry injures his hamstring in the Golden State Warriors' 99-88 win against the Minnesota Timberwolves in the NBA play-offs.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Stephen Curry injured as Golden State beat Minnesota
